#!/bin/bash
if [ -f "/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.opendns.osx.RoamingClientConfigUpdater.plist" ]; then
ps auwwx | egrep "dnscrypt|RoamingClientMenubar|dns-updater" | grep -vq egrep; if [[ 0 == $? ]]; then echo "<result>Enabled</result>" else echo "<result>Disabled</result>" fi
else echo "<result>Not Installed</result>" fi
